verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 1:
When I'm dry and thirsty Lord,
And I'm crying out for more,
I know I can trust in your love.
In the darkness in the night,
When I'm starving for the light,
I know I can trust in your love.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You keep no record of my sin
You don't remember all my shame

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Your love, heals every disease
Your love, fulfills my every need
Your love, is everything to me
Your love, is everything

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
I will not forget, I won't forget your promises
I will not forget, I won't forget your love (x4)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will not forget, nothing impossible
I will not forget, I won't forget your love (x4)
